subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers have lost more than they’ve won since a big trade with Boston, while the Giants have gone on to win the N.L. West despite losing Melky Cabrera to a suspension.
snippet: The Dodgers have lost more than they’ve won since a big trade with Boston, while the Giants have gone on to win the N.L. West despite losing Melky Cabrera to a suspension.
